columns.dc:description: The name of the organisation to which the dataset relates.
The Uniform Resource Identifier which contains the description of the organisation named in Organisation Name.
The financial year to which the data relates, in the format YYYY/YY.
On street parking income in GBP from parking.
On street parking income in GBP from the purchase of resident parking permits.
On street parking income in GBP from Penalty Charge Notices (PCN). PCN income cannot be split between on-street and car parks (off-street) so the amount stated is the total of all PCN income.
On street parking income in GBP from Blue Badge application fees.
On street parking income in GBP from other sources.
The total on street parking income in GBP.
On street parking direct costs in GBP from civil enforcement. Parking contract and enforcement - total enforcement contract costs included here as no split between on and off street.
On street parking direct costs in GBP from admin, appeals, debt recovery and maintenance. All staffing and running costs and central costs less enforcement and capital.
On street parking direct costs in GBP from scheme review/new schemes.
On street parking direct costs in GBP from capital charges.
On street parking direct costs in GBP from other aspects.
The total on street parking direct costs in GBP.
On street parking surplus/deficit in GBP (On Street Income:Total minus On Street Costs:Total). Deficit shown as negative amount.
Amount of on street parking surplus/deficit in GBP spent on off street parking provision
Amount of on street parking surplus/deficit in GBP spent on park and ride.
Amount of on street parking surplus/deficit in GBP spent on supported bus service.
Amount of on street parking surplus/deficit in GBP spent on concessionary fares and passes.
Amount of on street parking surplus/deficit in GBP spent on community transport.
Amount of on street parking surplus/deficit in GBP spent on Shopmobility.
Amount of on street parking surplus/deficit in GBP spent on school crossing patrols.
Amount of on street parking surplus/deficit in GBP spent on highway maintenance and traffic improvement.
Amount of on street parking surplus/deficit in GBP spent on transport planning costs.
Amount of on street parking surplus/deficit in GBP spent on other apects.
Off street parking income in GBP from parking.

Off street parking income resulting from Penalty Charge Notices (PCN). PCN income cannot be split between on-street and car parks (off-street) so the value stated is NA and the total amount of all PCN income is given in on_street_income_pcn.
Off street parking income in GBP from other sources.
The total off street parking income in GBP
The total off street parking direct costs in GBP.
Off street parking surplus/deficit in GBP (Off Street Income:Total minus Off Street Costs:Total). Deficit shown as negative amount.
